Interest rates: Popularity of short-term mortgage borrowing surges – at a cost https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/personal-finance/interest-rates-popularity-of-short-term-mortgage-borrowing-surges-at-a-cost/GA6ARKYFWBGXDPGISJQL5SIFLU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/personal-finance/interest-rates-popularity-of-short-term-mortgage-borrowing-surges-at-a-cost/GA6ARKYFWBGXDPGISJQL5SIFLU/ Jenée TibshraenyNearly 90% of new mortgage lending in October was floating or fixed for a year or less. Photo / Alex Burton
